hero.title: Stock Valuation
hero.description: Multi-Stage DCF, DDM (2-Stage, 3-Stage, H-Model), Graham, RIM Ohlson, FCFE/FCFF, Monte Carlo, NK DSGE, HJM and more.
hero.noRegister: No registration required to try. Complete analysis in seconds.

market.title: Real-Time Market
market.description: The most active stocks of the day and the latest financial news

features.title: Key Features
features.description: Professional financial analysis tools accessible to everyone

neuralEngine.title: 12-Layer Neural Engine
neuralEngine.description: Deep analysis combining NLP, Monte Carlo, institutional flow and more for accurate recommendations.

valuations.title: Multiple Valuations
valuations.description: DCF, DDM, Graham, Owner Earnings, EV/EBITDA, PEG and more integrated valuation models.

quality.title: Quality Analysis
quality.description: 5 dimensions: Profitability, Financial Strength, Efficiency, Growth and Competitive Moat.

sentiment.title: News Sentiment
sentiment.description: NLP analysis of financial news with specialized bullish/bearish lexicons.

monteCarlo.title: Monte Carlo Simulation
monteCarlo.description: 5000 simulations to estimate probabilities and target price ranges.

technical.title: Technical Analysis
technical.description: Pivots, support, resistance, Fibonacci and automated price patterns.

institutional.title: Institutional Flow
institutional.description: Tracking institutional fund movements and "smart money".

journal.title: Investor Journal
journal.description: Record your trades, calculate P&L and analyze your historical performance.

forecasts.title: Analyst Forecasts
forecasts.description: Wall Street analyst consensus with revenue and EPS estimates.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to get professional analysis

step1.title: Enter the Ticker
step1.description: Type the stock symbol you want to analyze (e.g., AAPL, TSLA, MELI).

step2.title: Automatic Analysis
step2.description: Our neural engine processes 12 layers of analysis in seconds.

step3.title: Final Recommendation
step3.description: Receive a clear recommendation with target price, risks and catalysts.

modules.title: 21 Analysis Modules
modules.description: Each module is designed to give you a unique perspective of the company

pricing.title: Plans and Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that best fits your needs

about.title: About Us
about.description1: We are a team of financial engineers and software developers passionate about democratizing access to professional analysis tools.
about.description2: Our mission is to provide individual investors with the same analytical tools used by institutional investment funds, but in an accessible and easy-to-understand way.
about.description3: We combine artificial intelligence, fundamental and technical analysis to offer investment recommendations backed by data and proven methodologies.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Be the #1 analysis platform for retail

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: AI and machine learning applied to finance

cta.title: Start Analyzing Today
cta.description: Join thousands of investors who already use StockAnalyzer to make informed decisions.
